name: Mug. Missing.
description:
Your mug has gone missing. You need it to start the day with coffee to get you going. Go on a wide-ranging hunt for it in various places and timezones. 

This is a comedic CYOA (choose your own Adventure) style game.  It doesn't aim to make a lot of sense.

There are many paths through the game, but few endings (like just one in fact).
